text:
Administrative Arrangements (Removal of Inconsistency) Order 2020

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 5(2) of the Administrative Arrangements Act 1990 .

17 March 2020

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

PETER GUTWEIN

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Administrative Arrangements (Removal of Inconsistency) Order 2020 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Mental Health Act 2013 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Mental Health Act 2013 .

5.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Mental Health Act 2013 .

6.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Mental Health Act 2013 .

7.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Mental Health Act 2013 .

8.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Mental Health Act 2013 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 March 2020

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
